thread.title: Kenya: #MakeItKenya - Annual Wildebeest Migration to Broadcast Live Online
thread.title_full: Kenya: #MakeItKenya - Annual Wildebeest Migration to Broadcast Live Online

title: Kenya: #MakeItKenya - Annual Wildebeest Migration to Broadcast Live Online
text:
Web users from all over the world will be able to experience one of nature's great spectacles from their mobile phones, tablets or computers (file photo). By Susan Wong One of the "Seven New Wonders of the World" - the annual Wildebeest Migration from the Serengeti in Tanzania to Kenya's Maasai Mara - will be broadcasted live for the first time on the web from Kenya this week, allowing web users from all over the world to experience one of nature's great spectacles from their mobile phones, tablets or computers. Through Periscope, a live-streaming video app for Twitter, and YouTube's Live Streaming service, two daily broadcasts of between 10 and 20 minutes each for a week, will transport World Wide Web users on to game drives in Kenya. To watch the live broadcasts, follow @MakeItKenya on Twitter and register at discoverafrica.com/herdtrackerlive. Watch the live broadcasts at periscope.tv/herdtracker. #MakeItKenya (@MakeItKenya) is a Ministry of East African Affairs, Commerce & Tourism of Kenya initiative. Kenya
